'''Lily Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Lily was a daughter of [[Balbo Baggins]] and [[Berylla Baggins|Berylla Boffin]]. She married [[Togo Goodbody]] and had many descendants.<ref name=tree>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

During the last years of her life, the Shire suffered from the [[Fell Winter (Third Age)|Fell Winter]],<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref> and around that time she lost her elder brother [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto]]. Lily died the next year, as did her other brother, [[Largo Baggins|Largo]].<ref name=tree/>

==Etymology==
A ''lily'' is a plant of the ''[[wikipedia:Lilium|lilium]]'' genus, or to visually similar plants. It derives from Greek ''λείριον'' through Latin, ultimately of ancient Egyptian origin.<ref>[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/lily Wiktionary entry]</ref>
